name: rotki
description: Rotki is a self-hosted portfolio tracking and accounting tool for cryptocurrencies and DeFi platforms with full privacy. It features real-time reporting, tax tools, and a GUI with encrypted storage.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Generate tax reports for cryptocurrency transactions and capital gains

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Store all data locally with encrypted databases for complete privacy

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View portfolio performance over time with charts and analytics

features.title: Transaction Import
features.description: Import trades from exchanges via CSV or API connections

features.title: Cost Basis Tracking
features.description: Calculate accurate profit and loss using FIFO, LIFO, or other methods
